Author: grapplebutter
Text: i do the same thing and i tried to think about it like a challenge or a game; how long can i go without body checking. kinda like when ur on a run, you see how much longer you can go. since i always bodycheck after i go to the bathroom, in that moment i’ll be like “ok if i don’t look at my stomach this time that’ll be two times in a row, let’s see how long i can keep this up”. i think the hardest part is staying present in that moment and remembering not to bodycheck since it becomes a subconscious thing
